title: Arlington County opens new vaccination clinic at Amazon's HQ2 offices in Crystal City
author: Don Parker
description: Arlington County is opening a new vaccination clinic Monday at Amazon's HQ2 offices in Crystal City. The clinic at 2100 Crystal Drive will serve eligible priority groups, by appointment only, according to a statement released by the county. The clinic will be in a street-level storefront next to Amazon office space. The county also has vaccination clinics at Sequoia Plaza, Walter Reed Community Center, and Lubber Run Community Center.
cleaned_text: Arlington County to open new vaccination clinic at Amazon's HQ2 offices in Crystal City by Don Parker Amazon has submitted proposed development plans for the next phase of HQ2 construction in Arlington.
